alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:33PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Salt Lake...southeastern Davis and southwestern Morgan Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 433 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Magna, or near West Valley City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Bountiful, Taylorsville, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful, Salt Lake City International Airport, Magna, Kearns, University Of Utah and Antelope Island State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 305 and 321. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 105 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
